conwech.functions module¶

Functions of the conwech module.

conwech.functions.nameperiod(base_illion)[source]¶

Names the period for the given base-illion value.

Constructs a period name from lexical prefix components using each period in the given base-illion value. A base-illion value (b) represents a period’s exponent (x) where b = (x - 3) / 3.

Parameters

base_illion (int) – The base-illion value of the period name.

Returns

The name for the period with the given base-illion value.

conwech.functions.readperiod(period_name)[source]¶

Parses the given period name by indexing a tuple of valid period prefix components with the given period name.

Parameters

period_name (str) – The period name of any number period.

Returns

The base-illion value for the period with the given name.

conwech.functions.number2text(number)[source]¶

Constructs the English short-scale spelling of the given number.

Parameters

number (int, float, str) – The number to spell.

Returns

The spelling of the given number.

conwech.functions.text2number(text)[source]¶

Parses the given English short-scale spelling and returns the appropriate numerical value as a string.

Parameters

text (str) – The spelling of a number as a string.

Returns

A numeric string representing the given spelling.
